message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and innovation. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these aspects, I propose a special introductory price of $7500 for you. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this opportunity.
